pages.title: Quartz Vein
pages.text: Quartz Vein has medium reserve of various types of quartz

Main Ore:Quartz$(br)Associated Ores:Certus Quartz, Charges Certus Quartz, Dark Quartz$(br2)Heights:15-42$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Medium$(br)Vein Density:Dense$(br2)Indicator:Opal Glow Rose$(br)Vein Rarity:Rare$(br2)Dimension:Overworld
